# init(sampleBuffer:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ AVFoundation ](/documentation/avfoundation)

- [ AVTimedMetadataGroup ](/documentation/avfoundation/avtimedmetadatagroup)

- [ init(sampleBuffer:) ](/documentation/AVFoundation/AVTimedMetadataGroup/init(sampleBuffer:)-bjuo)

-  init(sampleBuffer:) 

Initializer# init(sampleBuffer:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.10–11.0DeprecatedtvOS 9.0–26.2DeprecatedvisionOS 1.0+watchOS 1.0–26.2Deprecated

```
init?(sampleBuffer: CMSampleBuffer)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/AVFoundation/AVTimedMetadataGroup/init(sampleBuffer:)-bjuo#parameters)

`sampleBuffer`A CMSampleBuffer with media type kCMMediaType_Metadata.

## [Return Value](/documentation/AVFoundation/AVTimedMetadataGroup/init(sampleBuffer:)-bjuo#return-value)

An instance of AVTimedMetadataGroup.

## [Discussion](/documentation/AVFoundation/AVTimedMetadataGroup/init(sampleBuffer:)-bjuo#discussion)

Initializes an instance of AVTimedMetadataGroup with a sample buffer.

## [See Also](/documentation/AVFoundation/AVTimedMetadataGroup/init(sampleBuffer:)-bjuo#see-also)

### [Creating a timed metadata group](/documentation/AVFoundation/AVTimedMetadataGroup/init(sampleBuffer:)-bjuo#Creating-a-timed-metadata-group)

[`convenience init?(sampleBuffer: CMReadySampleBuffer<CMSampleBuffer.DynamicContent>)`](/documentation/avfoundation/avtimedmetadatagroup/init(samplebuffer:)-6atlv)Creates a timed metadata group with a sample buffer.[`init(items: [AVMetadataItem], timeRange: CMTimeRange)`](/documentation/avfoundation/avtimedmetadatagroup/init(items:timerange:))Creates a timed metadata group initialized with the given metadata items.
